articles.title: Singer Ifunanya Nwangene Dies after Snake Bite, Emmy Kosgei Exposes Rogue Nairobi Pastors
articles.source: Breaking NEWS in KENYA for Today Right Now & Kenyan News | TUKO
articles.description: Emmy Kosgei narrated how some preachers in Nairobi are surviving. She joined a list of personalities who trended this week as highlighted by TUKO.co.ke.
articles.content: <ul><li>Nigerian singer Ifunanya Nwangene puzzled many after she died following a snake bite, and things took a drastic turn when another serpent was found under an ambulance carrying her remains</li… [+5911 chars]
articles.author: Amondi Aroko

articles.title: Gov't moves to boost farm mechanisation as New Holland opens new facility in Kenya
articles.description: The Kenyan government has stepped up efforts to promote farm mechanisation as New Holland Agriculture opened a new facility in Nairobi, part of a public-private partnership aimed at modernising the country’s largely manual farming sector
articles.content: The Kenyan government has stepped up efforts to promote farm mechanisation as New Holland Agriculture opened a new facility in Nairobi, part of a public-private partnership aimed at modernising the c… [+2378 chars]
articles.author: Benjamin Muriuki
